title: Pixel to Pixel migration (same model)
content:
Google has replaced a VERY badly performing 4a with, yet another 4a:
so the straight usbc to usb c cable SUPPLIED in the box does not work?
(requires additional 'permissions' but these are non existent in andriod 11)

Now using an former usb A to usb C cable AND the 'switch adapter' supplied in the box, and finally both handsets see each other;
 however :
the new handset is stuck on "Getting Account Info" (circle of death) for over half an hour now
the (former) handset is stuck on "Connected to new handset preparing....."
-is there ANY indication how long this (may) take ?
ok given files sizes this would not be an exact science, but roughly... ?
Why is there NO OTHER progress indication.. should I wait, Should I kill the process?????

This 'seamless' transfer from TWO phones of the SAME GOOGLE model is a real let down.

RESOLVED: had to REMOVE the cable, this FORCED a reboot and then the two phones continued correctly the set up in a few (5) minutes: not this ALSO meant the supplied straight usbC - usbC cable then miraculously worked as well?
Very strange, but finally worked.
category: Setting up and Personalizing your Device, Google Pixel 4a
